title: Мен және Сен
explanation_slides: **Мен** means "I" in Kazakh. It's used to refer to yourself. Remember this basic pronoun!\n\nFor example: **Мен оқушымын** (Men oqushymyn) - I am a student.
**Сен** means "you" (singular, informal) in Kazakh. Use it when speaking to someone you know well, like a friend or family member.\n\nFor example: **Сен кімсің?** (Sen kimsing?) - Who are you?

**Оқушы** means "student" in Kazakh. This is a useful noun to know. It applies to students of all ages.

For example: **Ол оқушы** (Ol oqushy) - He/She is a student.

Remember that Kazakh does not have grammatical gender, so **ол** can mean he or she.
examples: Мен оқушымын — I am a student
Сен оқушысың — You are a student (informal)
Ол оқушы — He/She is a student
Мен мұғаліммін — I am a teacher (from Unit 2)
Сен мұғалімсің — You are a teacher (informal)

quiz.question: Listen and choose the correct word.
